thread.title: 31. CAN'T STOP THE FEELING! - Justin Timberlake
thread.title_full: 31. CAN'T STOP THE FEELING! - Justin Timberlake

title: 31. CAN'T STOP THE FEELING! - Justin Timberlake
text: GWEN STEFANI IS IN DIS B by I fell down a bucket Here for Gwen and can't wait to hear her songs. üíó Excellent mix of old and new songs by LosAngelesMom I absolutely love how this album incorporates songs that span across several decades. It shows just how timeless great music is. There is something here for the grandparents, the parents, and the kids so it's definitely a crowd pleaser of an album. The remakes of the old songs were done very well, providing a nice update for 2016. The songs and the lyrics give listeners a true picture of what type of characters we will encounter when the Trolls movie finally comes out. Looking forward to seeing the movie with my 2 year old and 7 year old. As a teenager of yesteryear, it was all about those Trolls! ‚ò∫Ô∏è Job well done on putting together the soundtrack, JT! Album is freaking awesome
